title: Body Fitness Tracking System Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create Home page with hero section, navigation, and project branding
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays the project title prominently
Hero section includes a fitness-themed background image
Get Started button is visible and functional
Navigation bar contains all six links and is visible on all pages

file_operations.description: Configure React Router with routes for Home, Dashboard, Features, BMI Calculator, About, and Contact pages. Add routing logic to navigate between pages.

Create layout component with navigation bar containing links to Home, Dashboard, Features, BMI Calculator, About, and Contact. Include dark mode toggle in navigation. Use Tailwind CSS for responsive styling.

Create Home page displaying 'Body Fitness Tracking System by Rajeshwar Chaudhari' as the project title. Add hero section with fitness-themed background using the generated image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-fitness.dim_1920x800.png. Include 'Get Started' button that navigates to /dashboard. Use Tailwind CSS with gradient buttons and card-based layout.

requirements.summary: Add footer with college branding and team information
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages
Footer displays 'BYK College of Commerce'
Footer includes team members section
Footer shows '2025-26' academic year

file_operations.description: Create Footer component displaying 'BYK College of Commerce', team members section, and academic year '2025-26'. Use Tailwind CSS for styling with soft shadows and professional appearance.
Import and include Footer component in the layout so it appears on all pages.

requirements.summary: Create User Dashboard with fitness tracking metrics and weekly chart
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays step count with visual progress bar
Water intake tracker shows glasses consumed with functional add button
Calories burned metric is displayed
BMI summary is shown on the dashboard
Weekly progress chart renders using Chart.js library

file_operations.description: Create Dashboard page displaying step count tracker with progress bar, water intake tracker with add button (250ml increments), calories burned display, BMI result summary, and weekly progress chart. Use backend methods getUserData() and getWeeklyData() to fetch data. Use React-compatible charting solution or custom SVG charts (not Chart.js per constraints). Use generated icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-steps.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-water.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-calories.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-bmi.dim_128x128.png. Apply card-based layout with Tailwind CSS.
Create StepCounter component displaying daily steps with progress bar visualization. Accept steps data as props and show progress toward 10,000 step goal. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

Create WaterIntakeTracker component with add button to increment water intake by 250ml. Display progress toward 2-liter daily goal with progress bar. Call backend addWaterIntake() method when button is clicked. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

Create WeeklyChart component to visualize weekly fitness data using React-compatible charting solution or custom SVG implementation (not Chart.js). Accept weekly data array as props and render line or bar chart showing progress over time. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

requirements.summary: Add date selection and reset functionality to Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Date picker allows selection of different dates
Reset button clears all daily tracking data
Data persists correctly when switching between dates

file_operations.description: Add date picker input for selecting dates and reset button. Wire reset button to call backend resetDailyData() method. Implement date-based data filtering using getUserData() results. Use Tailwind CSS for date picker and button styling with gradient effects.

requirements.summary: Create BMI Calculator with formula-based calculation and result display
acceptanceCriteria: Input fields accept height in cm and weight in kg
BMI calculation uses the correct formula
Result displays accurate BMI value
Result shows correct category based on BMI ranges
Result is presented in a visually styled card

file_operations.description: Create BMI Calculator page with input fields for height (cm) and weight (kg). Add calculate button that calls backend calculateAndStoreBMI() method. Display BMI value and category (Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese) in a styled result card. Use Tailwind CSS with card-based layout, gradient buttons, and soft shadows.

requirements.summary: Implement Water Intake Tracker with 250ml increments and progress visualization
acceptanceCriteria: Each click adds exactly 250ml to water intake
Daily goal is set to 2 liters (2000ml)
Progress bar visually represents percentage toward goal
Progress bar updates in real-time after each click

file_operations.description: Ensure add button increments water intake by exactly 250ml per click. Set daily goal to 2000ml (2 liters). Update progress bar to show percentage calculation (current intake / 2000ml * 100%). Ensure real-time progress bar updates after each click using React state management.

requirements.summary: Create Step Counter with manual input and animated circular progress
acceptanceCriteria: Input field allows manual entry of step count
Daily goal displays as 10,000 steps
Circular progress bar animates to show progress percentage
Progress bar updates when step count changes

file_operations.description: Add manual step input field for users to enter step count. Display daily goal as 10,000 steps. Implement animated circular progress bar using SVG or CSS animations to show progress percentage. Update progress when step count changes. Use Tailwind CSS for styling with animations.

requirements.summary: Create Features page listing system capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Features page displays all six feature items
Each feature has a clear title and description
Page layout is visually consistent with overall design

file_operations.description: Create Features page listing six capabilities: Smart Tracking, Health Analytics, BMI Calculator, Goal Setting, Progress Reports, and Mobile Responsive Design. Display each feature with title and description in card-based layout. Use Tailwind CSS with gradient effects, soft shadows, and fitness-themed icons.

requirements.summary: Create About page with project information and team details
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes a project description section
Problem statement is clearly stated
Objectives are listed
Technologies section mentions HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Chart.js
Team members section is present

file_operations.description: Create About page with sections for project description, problem statement, objectives, technologies used (mention React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and charting solution used), and team members. Use card-based layout with Tailwind CSS styling.

requirements.summary: Create Contact page with form and college details
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes name, email, and message fields
Submit button is functional
College contact details are displayed on the page
Form validates required fields before submission

file_operations.description: Create Contact page with form containing name, email, and message input fields. Add submit button with form validation for required fields. Display BYK College of Commerce contact details. Use Tailwind CSS with gradient buttons and card-based form layout.

requirements.summary: Implement responsive design for all screen sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts to different screen sizes
All functionality works on mobile devices
Navigation is mobile-friendly
Content is readable on all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Add responsive navigation with mobile menu toggle for smaller screens. Use Tailwind CSS responsive utilities (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:) to ensure navigation is mobile-friendly and adapts to different screen sizes.
Add responsive typography and spacing rules using Tailwind CSS utilities. Ensure content is readable on all screen sizes with appropriate breakpoints and fluid layouts.

requirements.summary: Apply fitness-themed design with modern styling
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses card-based components throughout
Buttons have gradient styling
Soft shadows are applied to cards and elements
Fitness-themed icons are used appropriately
Typography uses Poppins or Roboto font family
Overall aesthetic is minimalist and professional

file_operations.description: Import Google Fonts Poppins or Roboto. Define custom Tailwind CSS utilities for gradient buttons, soft shadows on cards, and fitness color palette. Set base typography to use Poppins or Roboto font family. Create minimalist and professional design tokens.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom gradient colors for buttons, shadow utilities for cards, and font family settings for Poppins or Roboto. Add fitness-themed color palette (vibrant greens, blues, oranges).

requirements.summary: Add animations and hover effects to interactive elements
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons have hover effects
Cards have subtle animations on interaction
Transitions are smooth and professional
Animations enhance user experience without being distracting

file_operations.description: Add CSS transition utilities for hover effects on buttons and cards. Define animation keyframes for subtle card interactions. Use Tailwind CSS transition and transform utilities for smooth, professional animations.

requirements.summary: Implement dark mode toggle with theme persistence
acceptanceCriteria: Toggle switch is visible on all pages
Theme preference persists across sessions
All pages adapt to dark mode styling
Text remains readable in both modes

file_operations.description: Create custom hook for dark mode state management. Store theme preference in localStorage for persistence across sessions. Return current theme and toggle function.
Create DarkModeToggle component with switch UI. Use useDarkMode hook to manage theme state. Style with Tailwind CSS for smooth toggle animation.
Import and include DarkModeToggle component in navigation bar so it appears on all pages. Apply dark mode classes to layout based on theme state.
Enable Tailwind CSS dark mode with 'class' strategy. Define dark mode color variants for all components ensuring text readability in both themes.

requirements.summary: Create frontend-only login and register system
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form collects username and password
Login form authenticates against stored credentials
User credentials are stored in local storage
Login state persists across sessions
Dashboard is only accessible after login

file_operations.description: Create Login page with form containing username and password fields. Validate credentials against localStorage. Set login state and redirect to Dashboard on success. Use Tailwind CSS with gradient buttons and card-based form layout.

Create Register page with form collecting username and password. Store credentials in localStorage. Redirect to Login page after successful registration. Use Tailwind CSS with gradient buttons and card-based form layout.
Create custom hook for authentication state management. Handle login, logout, and registration logic. Store and retrieve user credentials from localStorage. Return authentication state and methods.

Create ProtectedRoute component that wraps Dashboard and other protected pages. Check authentication state using useAuth hook. Redirect to Login page if user is not authenticated. Allow access if authenticated.

Add routes for Login and Register pages. Wrap Dashboard route with ProtectedRoute component to restrict access to authenticated users only. Add navigation links to Login/Register in navigation bar when user is not logged in.
